content: ribby neckwarmer by tiennie size one size 2x2 rib is very dense warm and stretchy materials less than 1/2 skein of cascade 220 in any color 1 us #7 16 24 or 32 circular needle adjust needle size if necessary to obtain preferred gauge i knit in the round using the magic loop method but any method you prefer would certainly work - dpns can be used as well as the 2 circular needles method 1 stitch marker 1 tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge 8 sts = 1 in 2x2 rib counting both the knit sts and hidden purl sts abbreviations co - cast on bobble - bind off pm - place marker k - knit p - purl sts - stitches pattern co sts in multiples of 4 88 92 96 100 104 108 112 etc pm and join for knitting in the round be careful not to twist stitches work k2 p2 rib pattern until desired length bobble loosely in pattern notes on neckwarmers pictured above the pink and blue neckwarmers were 88 sts/round for 30 rounds the black neckwarmers were 100 sts/round for 40 rounds the dark green and brown neckwarmers were 108 sts/round for 35 rounds the light green neckwarmer was 120 sts/round for 45 rounds copyright 2009 by tiennie for tiennie knits at http //tiennie com this pattern is for private use only the pattern images or products made from the pattern may not be sold without the express written consent of the designer if you have any questions or find any errors please contact me at tiennieknits@comcast net thanks page 1 of 1
